item.title: A few thoughts on the BPS equity audit
item.description: Mixed feelings Auditors presented an equity audit of Belmont Public Schools to the School Committee in March 2022. The audit covered a lot of ground and brought to light a number of terribly troubling findings. A few that jumped out to me included: Black students in particular report feeling much less like they belong to BPS than other racial groups. Black students report that teachers don’t learn to properly learn their names.
